ISSUE.TITLE: Simple refactoring of NivoSliderPlugin class
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.20 beta After fixing a separate issue in `NivoSliderPlugin`, I would suggest the following simple refactorings for this class: i) Separate larger code sections into smaller methods ii) Separate the large `InsertPicture` line into multiple lines for simplicity iii) Remove redundant source code for banner picture 3 iv) Removal redundant comments for //pictures and //settings v) Call `_webHelper.GetStoreLocation(false)` only once rather than once for each picture. vi) Correct spelling of PLugin to Plugin in comments.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #3757 from davidandrewpowell/issue-3733-nivo-slider-plugin-not-installing Issue 3733 Nivo slider plugin not installing

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3800 Refactored NivoSliderPlugin Install() and Uninstall() methods. Refactorings include separating larger code sections into smaller methods, separating the large InsertPicture line into multiple lines for simplicity, removal of redundant source code for banner picture 3, removal of redundant comments for //pictures and //settings and calling of _webHelper.GetStoreLocation(false) only once rather than for each picture.
